38class SparseMatrix {
39
40public:

48#endif

53#endif

61 void initialize(bool partitioned, int blockSize, long nRows, long nCols, long nNZ);
62#endif
63 void clear(bool release = false);
64 void squeeze();

118#endif

167

171
